tracks.text: Dozens of bloodshot eyes open across the pillar. They move around, looking in all directions.
An eye turns to Flanlil and shoots a laser beam
severing her ear
Ninia screams. Raelza and Saito turn. Fade to white.
Title card featuring a locked book. Text, Memories of an Old Sorcerer
A bloody ear flies through the air in the cave
Ninia leaps, catches it, and inspects the ear.
She presses the glowing ear against Flanlil's head
A bloodshot eye turns to them
A red beam shines. Flanlil and Ninia embrace as red light surrounds them.
Raelza stands in front of them, deflecting the beam
The beam stops. The eyes look around
An eye shoots a beam
2 more eyes shoot beams
Gibungle blocks a beam
Guivre forms a magic shield against another beam
Saito stands behind Raelza
Lightning shoots from Morlock's staff and hits the dark spirit. The party shields their faces from the blast wave
White out
The party looks up
Smoke clears, revealing a dirty pillar with agitated, deeply bloodshot eyes
The eyes slow
Then shoot laser beams in all directions, carving up the cave walls
Cainz blocks the falling rocks with his shield. Raichee hides behind him
Monpui dodges a laser.
Gibungle blocks a laser with his arm shield
Raelza blocks a laser with her tower shield
Gibungle shoots a crossbow at an eyes. It closes its lid, and the arrow bounces off.
Raelza blocks for Ninia and Flanlil. Lafa blocks for Morlock and Saito
Flashback, Saito falls from a ceiling into Raelza's bed
Morlock stares intently at him
Characters jitter. Text, The Foolish Wizard who wished to turn back time
Pieces of metal bearing the letters C, R, and M hang on a string.
A young girl smiles and nods. Her purple eyes match Morlock's.
Text, The genius magician Morlock had a daughter
At night, in a stone house in an arid land, the girl lies in bed, feverish
The woman with short brown hair and blue eyes looks at the necklace on the table
Morlock enters and walks past. The woman stands.
Her face falls
He stops and glances over his shoulder at the girl
He walks out the front door, into the night
Daytime
The woman kneels motionless over the girl
Morlock blinks
3 gold coins
The necklace
The woman walks away from the house with a walking stick.
The necklace lies broken on the table
The girl's bed is empty
Morlock slumps in front of shelves of bookx
He throws books and furniture around
His eye falls on an ornate book
In the light of day, Morlock puts on a black hat. He wears the necklace, and walks into the day.
Soldiers stand guard in front of the Great Labyrinth. Morlock approaches
He proffers a gold coin
He walks through the caves, holding a lantern. The candle burns low.
He looks around
He stops in front of a wall with a vertical crack running along it.
The wall separates
A Japanese post box. A bicycle. A fishing trawler. An 18 wheeler. A vending machine.
Papers with notes and magic circles line the ground
He looks up
A short figure wears a white cloak and emanates a strong, purple aura
A blond woman with blue eyes peers through the darkness of the cloak
He puts the notes in his pocket. The woman gets closer. He readies his staff.
He closes his eyes, remembering his daughter
He puts a hand to the necklace over his heart, then stares at the cloaked figure
Light strobes from the figure's forehead
Purple and blue light press against each other
Morlock lies prone on the ground. The woman kneels, covered in dirt
She shines a light
Morlock walks out of the great labyrinth
Text, He had lost most of his memories
He mooks at the necklace pieces, rotated and out of order, spelling M, R, L
Text, No longer did the sins of his past torment him
No longer could he recall his daughter's smile
Morlock wears a heavy expression
Morlock clenches a fist. Saito takes it
Lafa and Gibungle smile behind their faltering shields
The other players turn
Flanlil, Raelza, and Liliza glow green
They leap in different directions. Liliza runs left, using her axe to block a beam. Flanlil runs right, dodging a beam.
She blocks a beam from hitting Guivre and Ninia
Beam
Shield
Lafa goes flying
Beam
Morlock looks
Saito leaps and blocks with an arm shield
A second beam knocks him back
Cainz and Monpui leap in front
Raichee hides behind a rock, forming a small shield.
Text, Idol Magician Rychee made a shield just big enough for herself!!
Gibungle and Lafa join Cainz and Monpui'
The pillar begins to spin, firing rapid, small beams.
Flanlil runs. Small blasts fire around her.
The pillar stops and fires a beam. Raelza blocks.
His staff glows. White out.
A blast of energy hangs in the air. The party holds out their shields, frozen. Lafa's wings are still.
Flanlil hangs mid jump. Smoke clouds are frozen.
Rychee hides behind a rock
Guivre and Ninia cast behind Raelza.
Text, Time stopped for everyone but Morlock.
Text, The Great Mage Who Forgets Everything
Text, Before time passes once more, counting to 100 is possible
